ernest
Interface ISensorymotorSystem

All Known Implementing Classes:
BinarySensorymotorSystem, Ernest12SensorimotorSystem
public interface ISensorymotorSystem

Generic interface for Ernest's sensorymotor system Support primitive binary interactions. Determine the enacted act from the selected schema and the binary feedback status.

Author:
ogeorgeon

Method Detail

init

void init(ISpas staticSystem,
          IImos imos,
          ITracer tracer)
Initialize the sensorymotor system with the connection to episodic memory and to the attentional system

Parameters:
episodicMemory - Ernest's episodic memory.
staticSystem - Ernest's static system.
imos - Ernest's motivational system.
tracer - Ernest's tracer.

addInteraction

IAct addInteraction(java.lang.String schemaLabel,
                    java.lang.String stimuliLabel,
                    int satisfaction)
Used by the environment to set the primitive binary sensorymotor acts.

Parameters:
schemaLabel - The schema's label that is interpreted by the environment.
status - The act's succeed or fail status
satisfaction - The act's satisfaction
Returns:
the created primitive act

                boolean status)
Determine the enacted act

Parameters:
schema - The enacted primitive schema
status - The status returned as a feedback from the enacted schema
Returns:
The enacted act
